entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 17.

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 17. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
